summary: An ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1989, for the improvement of Pasadena Place, from East 45th Street to East 40th Street, in the City of Seattle, by constructing a sewer therein, of proper dimensions and material, together with all wyes, openings, manholes, flush tanks, catch basins, and other appurtenances necessary for the proper drainage and sewerage of said district, under Ordinance No. 20394 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
